Q: Im a 44 years old female and just recently started having mild breast pain and chest main and also had a hysterromy at 32   but is it common for women to have those pain.Iv alson been under a lots od stress so could that play a big part of it. I also have had a breast mammagram since age 40. Just concern
A: HelloFresh and chest pain may be due to many reasons like acidity, musculo skeletal, cardio pulmonary causes etc. You may need clinical correlation and further investigations. You may need routine hologram, random blood sugar, chest X-ray (PA view), ECG in all leads. Further investigations like ECHO may be advised after evaluation. After clinical evaluation you may be advised mammography. Proper treatment depend upon findings. Get well soon. Take Care Chat Doctor.
